arts.ttl: Conte: ‘Napoli tried too hard to be pretty, gift to Torino’

arts.ttl: Napoli lose at Torino after late VAR ruling and ex-star Simeone bags the only goal
arts.sum: Noa Lang’s stoppage time equalizer was ruled out for offside and Napoli lost at Torino 1-0 in Serie A on Saturday, with former player Giovanni Simeone bagging the goal. Lang thought he rescued a valuable point for the defending champion, in the third minute of stoppages, and celebrated by ripping off his shirt and rushing to the away fans, banging on the barriers.

arts.sum: Rasmus Hojlund will lead the Napoli attack in an away game at Torino, while the...

There have been 81 official meetings between the two teams in Turin: record of 31 wins for the Granata (Torino), 26 draws, and 24 victories for the Azzurri (Napoli). Before the 3-3 draw in Rome against Lazio, Torino hadn`t scored 3 goals in a Serie A match.

Its been a disappointing start to the season for Torino with them winning one, drawing two and losing three of their opening six games. They had to settle for a 3-3 draw last time out against Lazio. ...
